casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lori Shannon ICARD. No. 236A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2008. C. Scott Holmes, Durham, for Icard. James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of May 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of May 2008."
